original_text: Some of Benjamin's descendants lived in Geba, Michmash, Aija, Bethel and its villages. Some of Benjamin's descendants lived in Geba, Michmash, Aija, Bethel and its villages.
korean_text: 또 베냐민 자손은 게바에서부터 믹마스와 아야와 벧엘과 그 주변 동네들에 거주하며

sentences.original_text: Some of Benjamin's descendants lived in Geba
sentences.korean_translation: 베냐민 자손 중 어떤 이들은 게바에 살았고

sentences.original_text: Some of Benjamin's descendants lived in Geba
sentences.korean_translation: 베냐민 자손 중 어떤 이들은 게바에 살았고
